title: Bug 44164 - Javadoc Update Needed for Image Constructor
description: This bug report highlights the need for an update in the Javadoc documentation for the constructor 'Image(Device, ImageData).' The provided code example demonstrates a potential issue with this constructor, which can throw an 'org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Unsupported color depth' exception.
OB: The observed behavior (OB) is that the constructor 'Image(Device, ImageData)' can potentially throw an 'org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Unsupported color depth' exception.
EB: The expected behavior (EB) should be to accurately document this potential exception in the Javadoc for the 'Image(Device, ImageData)' constructor.
SR: Steps to recreate the issue (note that the ImageData is successfully created, but it is the 'Image' object that throws the exception) are not provided in the report. Clear and detailed steps for reproducing the problem should be included in the report.
